name: Pixel World (itch) (amibeann, Justanotherpiccplayer, madeofyogurts)
description:
What happens when Vivi, a witch's familiar, decides to make a spell by herself while not being experienced in magic? Not great things! 

She travels to a world built out of pixels. What will happen to her? Who will she meet? Will she get back home?

- - -

A short visual novel made in Ren'py for the I Can't Write Jam 2020 with three endings to find.

ART - created by @amibeann and @Fried_Chicken3511

MUSIC - created by @justanotherpiccplayer

SCENARIO and CODE - created by @madeofyogurts
